btech.content: I am currently enrolled at Vignan's Institute of Information Technology, located in Visakhapatnam (Vizag), where I am pursuing a Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE). As a student at Vignan's, I am actively engaged in learning the fundamentals and advanced concepts of computer science, preparing myself for a dynamic career in the ever-evolving field of technology.

intermediate.content: I completed my intermediate education at Narayana Junior College, located in Filmnagar , Hyderabad. During my time at Narayana, I focused on a rigorous curriculum that prepared me for higher education in engineering. The college provided a strong foundation in various subjects, equipping me with the necessary skills and knowledge to pursue a Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE).

high_school.content: I completed my high school education from 8th to 10th grade at Narayana Olympiad. During these formative years, I was immersed in a rigorous academic environment that emphasized excellence in various subjects. The curriculum at Narayana Olympiad helped me develop strong analytical skills, a deep understanding of core concepts, and a passion for academic achievement.

school.content: I completed my early school education from 1st to 7th grade at Global Erudite. During these crucial years, I received a well-rounded education that fostered my intellectual growth and curiosity. The supportive and stimulating environment at Global Erudite helped me build a strong academic foundation and develop essential skills that have been instrumental in my educational journey.
